name: London Stock Exchange Group
goal: LSEG is the EU's most diversified exchange offering international business access to Europe's capital markets. The Group operates a broad range of international equity, bond and derivatives markets, including: London stock Exchange; Borsa Italiana; MTS-Europe's leading fixed income market; and Turquoise-offering UK and EU derivatives trading. LSEG operates four Central Couterparties (CCPs) - CC&G and three within LCH.Clearnet Group; trade repository - Unavista Ltd; and a Central Securities Depository - Monte Titoli. It also owns the Benchmark administrators FTSE Russell
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Taxation
